crashes after start. any ideas? thx.

If it crashes after start, make sure that you have the latest "Games for Windows Live" installed. Also, get the latest video card drivers and Windows updates. 

Post here if this fixed your crash problems.

Also, check this site for troubleshooting Dirt 3 problems:

http://www.gamebrood.com/2011/05/24/dirt-3-fix-and-fixes-to-crashes-errors-black-screen-graphics-issues-and-many-other-technical-problems/
